name: UpdateEnvironmentDatasetItem
description:
Update an environment dataset item in a project.

Use this tool to update specific details of a dataset item within a given environment of a project. It should be called when you need to modify existing dataset entries in an environment.

parameters.name: dataset_item_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string uniquely identifying the dataset item to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset item.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project you want to access. Retrieve it by making a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: environment_dataset_item_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details of the dataset item to update. Includes fields like id, dataset, input, output, metadata, among others.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset item.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset item.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
